dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: I sense the weak flicker of your presence intruding upon these sacred grounds. What brings you to the realm of the Wraithshade?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek knowledge and seek to understand this realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge is a fragile pursuit in the shadows. What knowledge do you hope to uncover?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I aim to learn the secrets of the Dreamlands to aid in restoring balance.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ah, the balance that teeters like a moth on a cobweb. Your quest is noble yet perilous. Will you embrace the shadows to achieve your goal?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will tread the shadows and seek the truth, even in darkness.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A brave choice, stepping into the realm of shadows with resolve. The shadows shall test your mettle. Only time will reveal if you are truly worthy.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I prefer to withdraw from the shadows and seek another path.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Fleeing from the shadows shows weakness. The Wraithshade does not abide the timid. You will face consequences for turning away.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am drawn by curiosity and the allure of the unknown.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Curiosity often leads the living astray into the realm of the dead. What draws your living heart to the whispers of the Wraithshade?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek to understand the mysteries that lie beyond the veil of death.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: The mysteries of death are not for the faint of heart. To seek them is to dance with eternity. Will you embrace the dance or stumble in fear?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I realize I have trespassed and will depart from this place.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Trespassers are unwelcome, yet depart you must. The shadows will watch as you retreat, but your presence will linger.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have come to challenge the darkness and prove my strength.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Strength is a fleeting illusion in the face of eternal shadows. Do you truly believe you can challenge what you do not understand?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will stand firm and confront the shadows, no matter the outcome.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bravery is admired, yet foolishness can be fatal. The shadows hunger for the reckless. Will you feed them with your resolve?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I yield to the darkness and retreat from this daunting task.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Retreating from the darkness shows wisdom or cowardice. The true test lies in how you face your choices.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come seeking an alliance and understanding with the Wraithshade.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: An alliance with the living is a fragile thread, easily severed by the winds of fate. What do you offer in exchange for the Wraithshade's favor?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer my knowledge and skills to aid the Wraithshade in its endeavors.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge and skills are potent gifts, yet tainted by the warmth of the living. The Wraithshade watches and waits for your true intentions to be revealed.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer my allegiance and vow to respect the boundaries of the Wraithshade.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Allegiance sworn in haste can be shattered by a single whisper in the dark. Will your vow ring true when tested by the shadows?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come to challenge the Wraithshade and prove my superiority over the shadows.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Superiority is a fleeting spark in the eternal night. Do you truly believe you can command the shadows to bow before you?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will demonstrate my power and show the Wraithshade my strength.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Power displayed is power tested. The shadows hunger for the bold. Will you sate their appetite with your defiance?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I acknowledge the darkness's strength and choose to retreat from this challenge.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Acknowledgment of the shadows' strength is the first step towards wisdom. Yet, the shadows remember those who retreat.
